MICHIGAN DEPARTMENT OF HEALTH AND HUMAN SERVICES
DIVISION OF CHILD WELFARE LICENSING
ADDENDUM TO ORIGINAL LICENSING STUDY REPORT
I. IDENTIFYING INFORMATION
License #: CB220201016
Licensee Name: Catholic Diocese of Marquette
Licensee Address: PO Box 550
444 South 4th Street
Marquette, MI 49855
Licensee Telephone #: (906)227-9119
Administrator/Licensee Designee: Kyle Rambo, Administrator
Name of Facility: Catholic Social Services of the Upper
Peninsula
Facility Address: 427 S. Stephenson, Suite 215
Iron Mountain, MI 49801
Facility Telephone #: (906) 774-3324
Capacity:
Program Type: CHILD PLACING AGENCY, PRIVATE
P.O. BOX 30650 • LANSING, MICHIGAN 48909-8150
www.michigan.gov • (517) 284-9727

II. Purpose of Addendum
The agency requested to change their office location from Escanaba to 427 S.
Stephenson, Suite 215, Iron Mountain, MI 49801.
The Division of Child Welfare Licensing is required to determine compliance with the
following rule:
R 400.12204 Facilities.
(1) An agency shall provide and maintain sufficient office space, equipment, and
supplies to ensure the delivery of services.
(2) An agency shall have physical office space with a Michigan street address.
III. Methodology
An on-site inspection was made on 09/24/2018 to 427 S. Stephenson, Suite 215
Iron Mountain, MI 49801.
IV. Description of Findings and Conclusions
The agency has a second-floor office in downtown Iron Mountain. The office is
located on the corner of S. Stephenson, which is U. S. Highway 2 and East A Street,
across from the Iron Mountain City Hall.
The suite of offices consists of four offices, one administrative support office, a
waiting room and a storage room. There is a shared large conference room outside
the suite of office which is used for staff meetings and Family Team Meetings. The
agency has used this office building in downtown Iron Mountain for approximately 30
years according to the Social Service Supervisor. The office hours are 8:30 to 5
Central Time.
The proposed office change to 427 S. Stephenson, Suite 215, Iron Mountain, MI
49801 has enough office space, equipment, and supplies to ensure the delivery of
services.
Parenting time if it is to occur in this suite of offices, the conference room or one of
the large offices could be used. The storage room is locked and there is a locked file
cabinet CHRI documents. A cross shredder is in the storage room.
P.O. BOX 30650 • LANSING, MICHIGAN 48909-8150
www.michigan.gov • (517) 284-9727

V. Recommendation
I recommend approval of the change of office location for Catholic Social Services of
the Upper Peninsula to 427 S. Stephenson, Suite 215, Iron Mountain, MI 49801.
09/26/2018
